202bool compare_sound_alert( const dangerous_sound &sound_a, const dangerous_sound &sound_b )
203{
204 if( sound_a.type != sound_b.type ) {
205 return sound_a.type < sound_b.type;
206 }
207 return sound_a.volume < sound_b.volume;
208}
209
210static bool clear_shot_reach( const tripoint &from, const tripoint &to, bool check_ally = true )
211{
212 std::vector<tripoint> path = line_to( from, to );
213 tripoint target_point = path.back();
214 path.pop_back();
215 if( path.empty() ) {
216 return true;
217 }
218 tripoint &last_point = path[0];
219 for( const tripoint &p : path ) {
220 Creature *inter = g->critter_at( p );
221 if( check_ally && inter != nullptr ) {
222 return false;
223 } else if( get_map().impassable( p ) ) {
224 return false;
225 } else if( get_map().obstructed_by_vehicle_rotation( last_point, p ) ) {
226 return false;
227 }
228 last_point = p;
229 }
230
231 return !get_map().obstructed_by_vehicle_rotation( last_point, target_point );
232}
233
234tripoint npc::good_escape_direction( bool include_pos )
235{
236 map &here = get_map();
237 if( path.empty() ) {
238 zone_type_id retreat_zone = zone_type_id( "NPC_RETREAT" );
239 const tripoint &abs_pos = global_square_location();
240 const zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
241 cata::optional<tripoint> retreat_target = mgr.get_nearest( retreat_zone, abs_pos, 60,
242 fac_id );
243 if( retreat_target && *retreat_target != abs_pos ) {
244 update_path( here.getlocal( *retreat_target ) );
245 if( !path.empty() ) {
246 return path[0];
247 }
248 }
249 }
250
251 std::vector<tripoint> candidates;
252
253 const auto rate_pt = [&]( const tripoint & pt, const float threat_val ) {
254 if( !can_move_to( pt, !rules.has_flag( ally_rule::allow_bash ) ) ) {
255 return MAX_FLOAT;
256 }
257 float rating = threat_val;
258 for( const auto &e : here.field_at( pt ) ) {
259 if( is_dangerous_field( e.second ) ) {
260 // TODO: Rate fire higher than smoke
261 rating += e.second.get_field_intensity();
262 }
263 }
264 return rating;
265 };
266
267 float best_rating = include_pos ? rate_pt( pos(), 0.0f ) : FLT_MAX;
268 candidates.emplace_back( pos() );
269
270 std::map<direction, float> adj_map;
271 for( direction pt_dir : npc_threat_dir ) {
272 const tripoint &pt = pos() + direction_XY( pt_dir );
273 float cur_rating = rate_pt( pt, ai_cache.threat_map[ pt_dir ] );
274 adj_map[pt_dir] = cur_rating;
275 if( cur_rating == best_rating ) {
276 candidates.emplace_back( pos() + direction_XY( pt_dir ) );
277 } else if( cur_rating < best_rating ) {
278 candidates.clear();
279 candidates.emplace_back( pos() + direction_XY( pt_dir ) );
280 best_rating = cur_rating;
281 }
282 }
283 return random_entry( candidates );
284}
285
286bool npc::sees_dangerous_field( const tripoint &p ) const
287{
288 return is_dangerous_fields( get_map().field_at( p ) );
289}
290
291bool npc::could_move_onto( const tripoint &p ) const
292{
293 map &here = get_map();
294 if( !here.passable( p ) ) {
295 return false;
296 }
297
298 if( !sees_dangerous_field( p ) ) {
299 return true;
300 }
301
302 const auto fields_here = here.field_at( pos() );
303 for( const auto &e : here.field_at( p ) ) {
304 if( !is_dangerous_field( e.second ) ) {
305 continue;
306 }
307
308 const auto *entry_here = fields_here.find_field( e.first );
309 if( entry_here == nullptr || entry_here->get_field_intensity() < e.second.get_field_intensity() ) {
310 return false;
311 }
312 }
313
314 return true;
315}
316
317std::vector<sphere> npc::find_dangerous_explosives() const
318{
319 std::vector<sphere> result;
320
321 const auto active_items = get_map().get_active_items_in_radius( pos(), MAX_VIEW_DISTANCE,
322 special_item_type::explosive );
323
324 for( const auto &elem : active_items ) {
325 const auto use = elem->type->get_use( "explosion" );
326
327 if( !use ) {
328 continue;
329 }
330
331 const explosion_iuse *actor = dynamic_cast<const explosion_iuse *>( use->get_actor_ptr() );
332 const int safe_range = actor->explosion.safe_range();
333
334 if( rl_dist( pos(), elem.position() ) >= safe_range ) {
335 continue; // Far enough.
336 }
337
338 const int turns_to_evacuate = 2 * safe_range / speed_rating();
339
340 if( elem->charges > turns_to_evacuate ) {
341 continue; // Consider only imminent dangers.
342 }
343
344 result.emplace_back( elem.position(), safe_range );
345 }
346
347 return result;
348}
349
350float npc::evaluate_enemy( const Creature &target ) const
351{
352 if( target.is_monster() ) {
353 const monster &mon = dynamic_cast<const monster &>( target );
354 float diff = static_cast<float>( mon.type->difficulty );
355 return std::min( diff, NPC_DANGER_MAX );
356 } else if( target.is_npc() || target.is_player() ) {
357 return std::min( character_danger( dynamic_cast<const player &>( target ) ),
358 NPC_DANGER_MAX );
359 } else {
360 return 0.0f;
361 }
362}
363
364static bool too_close( const tripoint &critter_pos, const tripoint &ally_pos, const int def_radius )
365{
366 return rl_dist( critter_pos, ally_pos ) <= def_radius;
367}
368
369void npc::assess_danger()
370{
371 float assessment = 0.0f;
372 float highest_priority = 1.0f;
373 int def_radius = rules.has_flag( ally_rule::follow_close ) ? follow_distance() : 6;
374
375 // Radius we can attack without moving
376 int max_range;
377 if( confident_range_cache ) {
378 max_range = *confident_range_cache;
379 } else {
380 invalidate_range_cache();
381 max_range = *confident_range_cache;
382 }
383
384 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
385 const bool self_defense_only = rules.engagement == combat_engagement::NO_MOVE ||
386 rules.engagement == combat_engagement::NONE;
387 const bool no_fighting = rules.has_flag( ally_rule::forbid_engage );
388 const bool must_retreat = is_walking_with() && rules.has_flag( ally_rule::follow_close ) &&
389 !too_close( pos(), player_character.pos(), follow_distance() );
390
391 if( is_player_ally() ) {
392 if( rules.engagement == combat_engagement::FREE_FIRE ) {
393 def_radius = std::max( 6, max_range );
394 } else if( self_defense_only ) {
395 def_radius = max_range;
396 } else if( no_fighting ) {
397 def_radius = 1;
398 }
399 }
400
401 const auto ok_by_rules = [max_range, def_radius, this, &player_character]( const Creature & c,
402 int dist,
403 int scaled_dist ) {
404 // If we're forbidden to attack, no need to check engagement rules
405 if( rules.has_flag( ally_rule::forbid_engage ) ) {
406 return false;
407 }
408 switch( rules.engagement ) {
409 case combat_engagement::NONE:
410 return false;
411 case combat_engagement::CLOSE:
412 // Either close to player or close enough that we can reach it and close to us
413 return ( dist <= max_range && scaled_dist <= def_radius * 0.5 ) ||
414 too_close( c.pos(), player_character.pos(), def_radius );
415 case combat_engagement::WEAK:
416 return c.get_hp() <= average_damage_dealt();
417 case combat_engagement::HIT:
418 return c.has_effect( effect_hit_by_player );
419 case combat_engagement::NO_MOVE:
420 return dist <= max_range;
421 case combat_engagement::FREE_FIRE:
422 return dist <= max_range;
423 case combat_engagement::ALL:
424 return true;
425 }
426
427 return true;
428 };
429 std::map<direction, float> cur_threat_map;
430 // start with a decayed version of last turn's map
431 for( direction threat_dir : npc_threat_dir ) {
432 cur_threat_map[ threat_dir ] = 0.25f * ai_cache.threat_map[ threat_dir ];
433 }
434 map &here = get_map();
435 // first, check if we're about to be consumed by fire
436 // TODO: Use the field cache
437 for( const tripoint &pt : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 6 ) ) {
438 if( pt == pos() || here.has_flag( TFLAG_FIRE_CONTAINER, pt ) ) {
439 continue;
440 }
441 if( here.get_field( pt, fd_fire ) != nullptr ) {
442 int dist = rl_dist( pos(), pt );
443 cur_threat_map[direction_from( pos(), pt )] += 2.0f * ( NPC_DANGER_MAX - dist );
444 if( dist < 3 && !has_effect( effect_npc_fire_bad ) ) {
445 warn_about( "fire_bad", 1_minutes );
446 add_effect( effect_npc_fire_bad, 5_turns );
447 path.clear();
448 }
449 }
450 }
451
452 // find our Character friends and enemies
453 std::vector<weak_ptr_fast<Creature>> hostile_guys;
454 for( const npc &guy : g->all_npcs() ) {
455 if( &guy == this ) {
456 continue;
457 }
458
459 if( has_faction_relationship( guy, npc_factions::watch_your_back ) ) {
460 ai_cache.friends.emplace_back( g->shared_from( guy ) );
461 } else if( attitude_to( guy ) != A_NEUTRAL && sees( guy.pos() ) ) {
462 hostile_guys.emplace_back( g->shared_from( guy ) );
463 }
464 }
465 if( sees( player_character.pos() ) ) {
466 if( is_enemy() ) {
467 hostile_guys.emplace_back( g->shared_from( player_character ) );
468 } else if( is_friendly( player_character ) ) {
469 ai_cache.friends.emplace_back( g->shared_from( player_character ) );
470 }
471 }
472
473 for( const monster &critter : g->all_monsters() ) {
474 auto att = critter.attitude_to( *this );
475 if( att == A_FRIENDLY ) {
476 ai_cache.friends.emplace_back( g->shared_from( critter ) );
477 continue;
478 }
479 if( att != A_HOSTILE && ( critter.friendly || !is_enemy() ) ) {
480 continue;
481 }
482 if( !sees( critter ) ) {
483 continue;
484 }
485 float critter_threat = evaluate_enemy( critter );
486 // warn and consider the odds for distant enemies
487 int dist = rl_dist( pos(), critter.pos() );
488 if( ( is_enemy() || !critter.friendly ) ) {
489 assessment += critter_threat;
490 if( critter_threat > ( 8.0f + personality.bravery + rng( 0, 5 ) ) ) {
491 warn_about( "monster", 10_minutes, critter.type->nname(), dist, critter.pos() );
492 }
493 }
494 if( must_retreat || no_fighting ) {
495 continue;
496 }
497 // ignore targets behind glass even if we can see them
498 if( !clear_shot_reach( pos(), critter.pos(), false ) ) {
499 continue;
500 }
501
502 float scaled_distance = std::max( 1.0f, dist / critter.speed_rating() );
503 float hp_percent = 1.0f - static_cast<float>( critter.get_hp() ) / critter.get_hp_max();
504 float critter_danger = std::max( critter_threat * ( hp_percent * 0.5f + 0.5f ),
505 NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW );
506 ai_cache.total_danger += critter_danger / scaled_distance;
507
508 // don't ignore monsters that are too close or too close to an ally if we can move
509 bool is_too_close = dist <= def_radius;
510 for( const weak_ptr_fast<Creature> &guy : ai_cache.friends ) {
511 if( is_too_close || self_defense_only ) {
512 break;
513 }
514 // HACK: Bit of a dirty hack - sometimes shared_from, returns nullptr or bad weak_ptr for
515 // friendly NPC when the NPC is riding a creature - I don't know why.
516 // so this skips the bad weak_ptrs, but this doesn't functionally change the AI Priority
517 // because the horse the NPC is riding is still in the ai_cache.friends vector,
518 // so either one would count as a friendly for this purpose.
519 if( guy.lock() ) {
520 is_too_close |= too_close( critter.pos(), guy.lock()->pos(), def_radius );
521 }
522 }
523 // ignore distant monsters that our rules prevent us from attacking
524 if( !is_too_close && is_player_ally() && !ok_by_rules( critter, dist, scaled_distance ) ) {
525 continue;
526 }
527 // prioritize the biggest, nearest threats, or the biggest threats that are threatening
528 // us or an ally
529 // critter danger is always at least NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW
530 float priority = std::max( critter_danger - 2.0f * ( scaled_distance - 1.0f ),
531 is_too_close ? critter_danger : 0.0f );
532 cur_threat_map[direction_from( pos(), critter.pos() )] += priority;
533 if( priority > highest_priority ) {
534 highest_priority = priority;
535 ai_cache.target = g->shared_from( critter );
536 ai_cache.danger = critter_danger;
537 }
538 }
539
540 if( assessment == 0.0 && hostile_guys.empty() ) {
541 ai_cache.danger_assessment = assessment;
542 return;
543 }
544 const auto handle_hostile = [&]( const Character & foe, float foe_threat,
545 const std::string & bogey, const std::string & warning ) {
546 int dist = rl_dist( pos(), foe.pos() );
547 if( foe_threat > ( 8.0f + personality.bravery + rng( 0, 5 ) ) ) {
548 warn_about( "monster", 10_minutes, bogey, dist, foe.pos() );
549 }
550
551 int scaled_distance = std::max( 1, ( 100 * dist ) / foe.get_speed() );
552 ai_cache.total_danger += foe_threat / scaled_distance;
553 if( must_retreat || no_fighting ) {
554 return 0.0f;
555 }
556 // ignore targets behind glass even if we can see them
557 if( !clear_shot_reach( pos(), foe.pos(), false ) ) {
558 return 0.0f;
559 }
560 bool is_too_close = dist <= def_radius;
561 for( const weak_ptr_fast<Creature> &guy : ai_cache.friends ) {
562 if( self_defense_only ) {
563 break;
564 }
565 is_too_close |= too_close( foe.pos(), guy.lock()->pos(), def_radius );
566 if( is_too_close ) {
567 break;
568 }
569 }
570
571 if( !is_player_ally() || is_too_close || ok_by_rules( foe, dist, scaled_distance ) ) {
572 float priority = std::max( foe_threat - 2.0f * ( scaled_distance - 1 ),
573 is_too_close ? std::max( foe_threat, NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW ) :
574 0.0f );
575 cur_threat_map[direction_from( pos(), foe.pos() )] += priority;
576 if( priority > highest_priority ) {
577 warn_about( warning, 1_minutes );
578 highest_priority = priority;
579 ai_cache.danger = foe_threat;
580 ai_cache.target = g->shared_from( foe );
581 }
582 }
583 return foe_threat;
584 };
585
586 for( const weak_ptr_fast<Creature> &guy : hostile_guys ) {
587 player *foe = dynamic_cast<player *>( guy.lock().get() );
588 if( foe && foe->is_npc() ) {
589 assessment += handle_hostile( *foe, evaluate_enemy( *foe ), "bandit", "kill_npc" );
590 }
591 }
592
593 for( const weak_ptr_fast<Creature> &guy : ai_cache.friends ) {
594 player *ally = dynamic_cast<player *>( guy.lock().get() );
595 if( !( ally && ally->is_npc() ) ) {
596 continue;
597 }
598 float guy_threat = evaluate_enemy( *ally );
599 float min_danger = assessment >= NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW ? NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW : -10.0f;
600 assessment = std::max( min_danger, assessment - guy_threat * 0.5f );
601 }
602
603 if( sees( player_character.pos() ) ) {
604 // Mod for the player
605 // cap player difficulty at 150
606 float player_diff = evaluate_enemy( player_character );
607 if( is_enemy() ) {
608 assessment += handle_hostile( player_character, player_diff, "maniac", "kill_player" );
609 } else if( is_friendly( player_character ) ) {
610 float min_danger = assessment >= NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW ? NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW : -10.0f;
611 assessment = std::max( min_danger, assessment - player_diff * 0.5f );
612 ai_cache.friends.emplace_back( g->shared_from( player_character ) );
613 }
614 }
615 assessment *= 0.1f;
616 if( !has_effect( effect_npc_run_away ) && !has_effect( effect_npc_fire_bad ) ) {
617 float my_diff = evaluate_enemy( *this );
618 if( ( my_diff * 0.5f + personality.bravery + rng( 0, 10 ) ) < assessment ) {
619 time_duration run_away_for = 5_turns + 1_turns * rng( 0, 5 );
620 warn_about( "run_away", run_away_for );
621 add_effect( effect_npc_run_away, run_away_for );
622 path.clear();
623 }
624 }
625 // update the threat cache
626 for( size_t i = 0; i < 8; i++ ) {
627 direction threat_dir = npc_threat_dir[i];
628 direction dir_right = npc_threat_dir[( i + 1 ) % 8];
629 direction dir_left = npc_threat_dir[( i + 7 ) % 8 ];
630 ai_cache.threat_map[threat_dir] = cur_threat_map[threat_dir] + 0.1f *
631 ( cur_threat_map[dir_right] + cur_threat_map[dir_left] );
632 }
633 if( assessment <= 2.0f ) {
634 assessment = -10.0f + 5.0f * assessment; // Low danger if no monsters around
635 }
636 ai_cache.danger_assessment = assessment;
637}
638
639float npc::character_danger( const Character &u ) const
640{
641 float ret = 0.0;
642 bool u_gun = u.weapon.is_gun();
643 bool my_gun = weapon.is_gun();
644 double u_weap_val = npc_ai::weapon_value( u, u.weapon );
645 const double &my_weap_val = ai_cache.my_weapon_value;
646 if( u_gun && !my_gun ) {
647 u_weap_val *= 1.5f;
648 }
649 ret += u_weap_val;
650
651 ret += hp_percentage() * get_hp_max( bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) / 100.0 / my_weap_val;
652
653 ret += my_gun ? u.get_dodge() / 2 : u.get_dodge();
654
655 ret *= std::max( 0.5, u.get_speed() / 100.0 );
656
657 add_msg( m_debug, "%s danger: %1f", u.disp_name(), ret );
658 return ret;
659}
660
661void npc::regen_ai_cache()
662{
663 map &here = get_map();
664 auto i = std::begin( ai_cache.sound_alerts );
665 while( i != std::end( ai_cache.sound_alerts ) ) {
666 if( sees( here.getlocal( i->abs_pos ) ) ) {
667 i = ai_cache.sound_alerts.erase( i );
668 if( ai_cache.sound_alerts.size() == 1 ) {
669 path.clear();
670 }
671 } else {
672 ++i;
673 }
674 }
675 float old_assessment = ai_cache.danger_assessment;
676 ai_cache.friends.clear();
677 ai_cache.target = shared_ptr_fast<Creature>();
678 ai_cache.ally = shared_ptr_fast<Creature>();
679 ai_cache.can_heal.clear_all();
680 ai_cache.danger = 0.0f;
681 ai_cache.total_danger = 0.0f;
682 ai_cache.my_weapon_value = npc_ai::weapon_value( *this, weapon );
683 ai_cache.dangerous_explosives = find_dangerous_explosives();
684
685 assess_danger();
686 if( old_assessment > NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW && ai_cache.danger_assessment <= 0 ) {
687 warn_about( "relax", 30_minutes );
688 } else if( old_assessment <= 0.0f && ai_cache.danger_assessment > NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW ) {
689 warn_about( "general_danger" );
690 }
691 // Non-allied NPCs with a completed mission should move to the player
692 if( !is_player_ally() && !is_stationary( true ) ) {
693 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
694 for( auto &miss : chatbin.missions_assigned ) {
695 if( miss->is_complete( getID() ) ) {
696 // unless the player found an item and already told the NPC he wanted to keep it
697 const mission_goal &mgoal = miss->get_type().goal;
698 if( ( mgoal == MGOAL_FIND_ITEM || mgoal == MGOAL_FIND_ANY_ITEM ||
699 mgoal == MGOAL_FIND_ITEM_GROUP ) &&
700 has_effect( effect_npc_player_looking ) ) {
701 continue;
702 }
703 if( global_omt_location() != player_character.global_omt_location() ) {
704 goal = player_character.global_omt_location();
705 }
706 set_attitude( NPCATT_TALK );
707 break;
708 }
709 }
710 }
711}
712
713void npc::move()
714{
715 // don't just return from this function without doing something
716 // that will eventually subtract moves, or change the NPC to a different type of action.
717 // because this will result in an infinite loop
718 if( attitude == NPCATT_FLEE ) {
719 set_attitude( NPCATT_FLEE_TEMP ); // Only run for so many hours
720 } else if( attitude == NPCATT_FLEE_TEMP && !has_effect( effect_npc_flee_player ) ) {
721 set_attitude( NPCATT_NULL );
722 }
723 regen_ai_cache();
724 adjust_power_cbms();
725 // NPCs under operation should just stay still
726 if( activity.id() == activity_id( "ACT_OPERATION" ) ) {
727 execute_action( npc_player_activity );
728 return;
729 }
730
731 npc_action action = npc_undecided;
732
733 static const std::string no_target_str = "none";
734 const Creature *target = current_target();
735 const std::string &target_name = target != nullptr ? target->disp_name() : no_target_str;
736 add_msg( m_debug, "NPC %s: target = %s, danger = %.1f, range = %d",
737 name, target_name, ai_cache.danger, weapon.is_gun() ? confident_shoot_range( weapon,
738 ranged::recoil_total( *this ) ) : weapon.reach_range( *this ) );
739
740 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
741 //faction opinion determines if it should consider you hostile
742 if( !is_enemy() && guaranteed_hostile() && sees( player_character ) ) {
743 if( is_player_ally() ) {
744 mutiny();
745 }
746 add_msg( m_debug, "NPC %s turning hostile because is guaranteed_hostile()", name );
747 if( op_of_u.fear > 10 + personality.aggression + personality.bravery ) {
748 set_attitude( NPCATT_FLEE_TEMP ); // We don't want to take u on!
749 } else {
750 set_attitude( NPCATT_KILL ); // Yeah, we think we could take you!
751 }
752 }
753
754 /* This bypasses the logic to determine the npc action, but this all needs to be rewritten
755 * anyway.
756 * NPC won't avoid dangerous terrain while accompanying the player inside a vehicle to keep
757 * them from inadvertently getting themselves run over and/or cause vehicle related errors.
758 * NPCs flee from uncontained fires within 3 tiles
759 */
760 if( !in_vehicle && ( sees_dangerous_field( pos() ) || has_effect( effect_npc_fire_bad ) ) ) {
761 if( sees_dangerous_field( pos() ) ) {
762 path.clear();
763 }
764 const tripoint escape_dir = good_escape_direction( sees_dangerous_field( pos() ) );
765 if( escape_dir != pos() ) {
766 move_to( escape_dir );
767 return;
768 }
769 }
770
771 // TODO: Place player-aiding actions here, with a weight
772
773 /* NPCs are fairly suicidal so at this point we will do a quick check to see if
774 * something nasty is going to happen.
775 */
776
777 if( is_enemy() && vehicle_danger( avoidance_vehicles_radius ) > 0 ) {
778 // TODO: Think about how this actually needs to work, for now assume flee from player
779 ai_cache.target = g->shared_from( player_character );
780 }
781
782 map &here = get_map();
783 if( !ai_cache.dangerous_explosives.empty() ) {
784 action = npc_escape_explosion;
785 } else if( target == &player_character && attitude == NPCATT_FLEE_TEMP ) {
786 action = method_of_fleeing();
787 } else if( has_effect( effect_npc_run_away ) ) {
788 action = method_of_fleeing();
789 } else if( has_effect( effect_asthma ) && ( has_charges( itype_inhaler, 1 ) ||
790 has_charges( itype_oxygen_tank, 1 ) ||
791 has_charges( itype_smoxygen_tank, 1 ) ) ) {
792 action = npc_heal;
793 } else if( target != nullptr && ai_cache.danger > 0 ) {
794 action = method_of_attack();
795 } else if( !ai_cache.sound_alerts.empty() && !is_walking_with() ) {
796 tripoint cur_s_abs_pos = ai_cache.s_abs_pos;
797 if( !ai_cache.guard_pos ) {
798 ai_cache.guard_pos = here.getabs( pos() );
799 }
800 if( ai_cache.sound_alerts.size() > 1 ) {
801 std::sort( ai_cache.sound_alerts.begin(), ai_cache.sound_alerts.end(),
802 compare_sound_alert );
803 if( ai_cache.sound_alerts.size() > 10 ) {
804 ai_cache.sound_alerts.resize( 10 );
805 }
806 }
807 action = npc_investigate_sound;
808 if( ai_cache.sound_alerts.front().abs_pos != cur_s_abs_pos ) {
809 ai_cache.stuck = 0;
810 ai_cache.s_abs_pos = ai_cache.sound_alerts.front().abs_pos;
811 } else if( ai_cache.stuck > 10 ) {
812 ai_cache.stuck = 0;
813 if( ai_cache.sound_alerts.size() == 1 ) {
814 ai_cache.sound_alerts.clear();
815 action = npc_return_to_guard_pos;
816 } else {
817 ai_cache.s_abs_pos = ai_cache.sound_alerts.at( 1 ).abs_pos;
818 }
819 }
820 if( action == npc_investigate_sound ) {
821 add_msg( m_debug, "NPC %s: investigating sound at x(%d) y(%d)", name,
822 ai_cache.s_abs_pos.x, ai_cache.s_abs_pos.y );
823 }
824 } else if( ai_cache.sound_alerts.empty() && ai_cache.guard_pos ) {
825 tripoint return_guard_pos = *ai_cache.guard_pos;
826 add_msg( m_debug, "NPC %s: returning to guard spot at x(%d) y(%d)", name,
827 return_guard_pos.x, return_guard_pos.y );
828 action = npc_return_to_guard_pos;
829 } else {
830 // No present danger
831 deactivate_combat_cbms();
832
833 action = address_needs();
834 print_action( "address_needs %s", action );
835
836 if( action == npc_undecided ) {
837 action = address_player();
838 print_action( "address_player %s", action );
839 }
840 }
841
842 // check if in vehicle before doing any other follow activities
843 if( action == npc_undecided && is_walking_with() && player_character.in_vehicle && !in_vehicle ) {
844 action = npc_follow_embarked;
845 }
846
847 if( action == npc_undecided && is_walking_with() && rules.has_flag( ally_rule::follow_close ) &&
848 rl_dist( pos(), player_character.pos() ) > follow_distance() ) {
849 action = npc_follow_player;
850 }
851
852 if( action == npc_undecided && attitude == NPCATT_ACTIVITY ) {
853 if( has_stashed_activity() ) {
854 if( !check_outbounds_activity( get_stashed_activity(), true ) ) {
855 assign_stashed_activity();
856 } else {
857 // wait a turn, because next turn, the object of our activity
858 // may have been loaded in.
859 set_moves( 0 );
860 }
861 return;
862 }
863 std::vector<tripoint> activity_route = get_auto_move_route();
864 if( !activity_route.empty() && !has_destination_activity() ) {
865 tripoint final_destination;
866 if( destination_point ) {
867 final_destination = here.getlocal( *destination_point );
868 } else {
869 final_destination = activity_route.back();
870 }
871 update_path( final_destination );
872 if( !path.empty() ) {
873 move_to_next();
874 return;
875 }
876 }
877 if( has_destination_activity() ) {
878 start_destination_activity();
879 action = npc_player_activity;
880 } else if( has_player_activity() ) {
881 action = npc_player_activity;
882 }
883 }
884 if( action == npc_undecided ) {
885 // an interrupted activity can cause this situation. stops allied NPCs zooming off
886 // like random NPCs
887 if( attitude == NPCATT_ACTIVITY && !activity ) {
888 revert_after_activity();
889 if( is_ally( player_character ) ) {
890 attitude = NPCATT_FOLLOW;
891 mission = NPC_MISSION_NULL;
892 }
893 }
894 if( assigned_camp && attitude != NPCATT_ACTIVITY ) {
895 if( has_job() && calendar::once_every( 10_minutes ) && find_job_to_perform() ) {
896 action = npc_player_activity;
897 } else {
898 action = npc_worker_downtime;
899 goal = global_omt_location();
900 }
901 }
902 if( is_stationary( true ) && !assigned_camp ) {
903 // if we're in a vehicle, stay in the vehicle
904 if( in_vehicle ) {
905 action = npc_pause;
906 goal = global_omt_location();
907 } else {
908 action = goal == global_omt_location() ? npc_pause : npc_goto_destination;
909 }
910 } else if( has_new_items && scan_new_items() ) {
911 return;
912 } else if( !fetching_item ) {
913 find_item();
914 print_action( "find_item %s", action );
915 } else if( assigned_camp ) {
916 // this should be covered above, but justincase to stop them zooming away.
917 action = npc_pause;
918 }
919
920 // check if in vehicle before rushing off to fetch things
921 if( is_walking_with() && player_character.in_vehicle ) {
922 action = npc_follow_embarked;
923 } else if( fetching_item ) {
924 // Set to true if find_item() found something
925 action = npc_pickup;
926 } else if( is_following() ) {
927 // No items, so follow the player?
928 action = npc_follow_player;
929 }
930 // Friendly NPCs who are followers/ doing tasks for the player should never get here.
931 // This will revert them to a dynamic NPC state.
932 if( action == npc_undecided ) {
933 // Do our long-term action
934 action = long_term_goal_action();
935 print_action( "long_term_goal_action %s", action );
936 }
937 }
938
939 /* Sometimes we'll be following the player at this point, but close enough that
940 * "following" means standing still. If that's the case, if there are any
941 * monsters around, we should attack them after all!
942 *
943 * If we are following a embarked player and we are in a vehicle then shoot anyway
944 * as we are most likely riding shotgun
945 */
946 if( ai_cache.danger > 0 && target != nullptr &&
947 (
948 ( action == npc_follow_embarked && in_vehicle ) ||
949 ( action == npc_follow_player &&
950 ( rl_dist( pos(), player_character.pos() ) <= follow_distance() ||
951 posz() != player_character.posz() ) )
952 ) ) {
953 action = method_of_attack();
954 }
955
956 add_msg( m_debug, "%s chose action %s.", name, npc_action_name( action ) );
957 execute_action( action );
958}
959
960void npc::execute_action( npc_action action )
961{
962 int oldmoves = moves;
963 tripoint tar = pos();
964 Creature *cur = current_target();
965 if( action == npc_flee ) {
966 tar = good_escape_direction( false );
967 } else if( cur != nullptr ) {
968 tar = cur->pos();
969 }
970 /*
971 debugmsg("%s ran execute_action() with target = %d! Action %s",
972 name, target, npc_action_name(action));
973 */
974
975 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
976 map &here = get_map();
977 switch( action ) {
978 case npc_pause:
979 move_pause();
980 break;
981 case npc_worker_downtime:
982 worker_downtime();
983 break;
984 case npc_reload: {
985 do_reload( weapon );
986 }
987 break;
988
989 case npc_investigate_sound: {
990 tripoint cur_pos = pos();
991 update_path( here.getlocal( ai_cache.s_abs_pos ) );
992 move_to_next();
993 if( pos() == cur_pos ) {
994 ai_cache.stuck += 1;
995 }
996 }
997 break;
998
999 case npc_return_to_guard_pos: {
1000 const tripoint local_guard_pos = here.getlocal( *ai_cache.guard_pos );
1001 update_path( local_guard_pos );
1002 if( pos() == local_guard_pos || path.empty() ) {
1003 move_pause();
1004 ai_cache.guard_pos = cata::nullopt;
1005 path.clear();
1006 } else {
1007 move_to_next();
1008 }
1009 }
1010 break;
1011
1012 case npc_sleep: {
1013 // TODO: Allow stims when not too tired
1014 // Find a nice spot to sleep
1015 int best_sleepy = character_funcs::rate_sleep_spot( *this, pos() );
1016 tripoint best_spot = pos();
1017 for( const tripoint &p : closest_points_first( pos(), 6 ) ) {
1018 if( !could_move_onto( p ) || !g->is_empty( p ) ) {
1019 continue;
1020 }
1021
1022 // TODO: Blankets when it's cold
1023 const int sleepy = character_funcs::rate_sleep_spot( *this, p );
1024 if( sleepy > best_sleepy ) {
1025 best_sleepy = sleepy;
1026 best_spot = p;
1027 }
1028 }
1029 if( is_walking_with() ) {
1030 complain_about( "napping", 30_minutes, _( "<warn_sleep>" ) );
1031 }
1032 update_path( best_spot );
1033 // TODO: Handle empty path better
1034 if( best_spot == pos() || path.empty() ) {
1035 move_pause();
1036 if( !has_effect( effect_lying_down ) ) {
1037 activate_bionic_by_id( bio_soporific );
1038 add_effect( effect_lying_down, 30_minutes, num_bp, 1 );
1039 if( player_character.sees( *this ) && !player_character.in_sleep_state() ) {
1040 add_msg( _( "%s lies down to sleep." ), name );
1041 }
1042 }
1043 } else {
1044 move_to_next();
1045 }
1046 }
1047 break;
1048
1049 case npc_pickup:
1050 pick_up_item();
1051 break;
1052
1053 case npc_heal:
1054 heal_self();
1055 break;
1056
1057 case npc_use_painkiller:
1058 use_painkiller();
1059 break;
1060
1061 case npc_drop_items:
1062 /* NPCs can't choose this action anymore, but at least it works */
1063 drop_invalid_inventory();
1064 /* drop_items is still broken
1065 * drop_items( weight_carried() - weight_capacity(),
1066 * volume_carried() - volume_capacity() );
1067 */
1068 move_pause();
1069 break;
1070
1071 case npc_flee:
1072 if( path.empty() ) {
1073 move_to( tar );
1074 } else {
1075 move_to_next();
1076 }
1077 break;
1078
1079 case npc_reach_attack:
1080 if( can_use_offensive_cbm() ) {
1081 activate_bionic_by_id( bio_hydraulics );
1082 }
1083 reach_attack( tar );
1084 break;
1085 case npc_melee:
1086 update_path( tar );
1087 if( path.size() > 1 ) {
1088 move_to_next();
1089 } else if( path.size() == 1 ) {
1090 if( cur != nullptr ) {
1091 if( can_use_offensive_cbm() ) {
1092 activate_bionic_by_id( bio_hydraulics );
1093 }
1094 melee_attack( *cur, true );
1095 }
1096 } else {
1097 look_for_player( player_character );
1098 }
1099 break;
1100
1101 case npc_aim:
1102 aim();
1103 break;
1104
1105 case npc_shoot: {
1106 auto mode = weapon.gun_current_mode();
1107 if( !mode ) {
1108 debugmsg( "NPC tried to shoot without valid mode" );
1109 break;
1110 }
1111 aim();
1112 if( is_hallucination() ) {
1113 pretend_fire( this, mode.qty, *mode );
1114 } else {
1115 add_msg( m_debug, "%s recoil on firing: %s", name, recoil );
1116 ranged::fire_gun( *this, tar, mode.qty, *mode );
1117 // "discard" the fake bio weapon after shooting it
1118 if( cbm_weapon_index >= 0 ) {
1119 discharge_cbm_weapon();
1120 }
1121 }
1122 break;
1123 }
1124
1125 case npc_look_for_player:
1126 if( saw_player_recently() && last_player_seen_pos && sees( *last_player_seen_pos ) ) {
1127 update_path( *last_player_seen_pos );
1128 move_to_next();
1129 } else {
1130 look_for_player( player_character );
1131 }
1132 break;
1133
1134 case npc_heal_player: {
1135 player *patient = dynamic_cast<player *>( current_ally() );
1136 if( patient ) {
1137 update_path( patient->pos() );
1138 if( path.size() == 1 ) { // We're adjacent to u, and thus can heal u
1139 heal_player( *patient );
1140 } else if( !path.empty() ) {
1141 say( _( "Hold still %s, I'm coming to help you." ), patient->disp_name() );
1142 move_to_next();
1143 } else {
1144 move_pause();
1145 }
1146 }
1147 break;
1148 }
1149 case npc_follow_player:
1150 update_path( player_character.pos() );
1151 if( static_cast<int>( path.size() ) <= follow_distance() &&
1152 player_character.posz() == posz() ) { // We're close enough to u.
1153 move_pause();
1154 } else if( !path.empty() ) {
1155 move_to_next();
1156 } else {
1157 move_pause();
1158 }
1159 // TODO: Make it only happen when it's safe
1160 complain();
1161 break;
1162
1163 case npc_follow_embarked: {
1164 const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( player_character.pos() );
1165
1166 if( !vp ) {
1167 debugmsg( "Following an embarked player with no vehicle at their location?" );
1168 // TODO: change to wait? - for now pause
1169 move_pause();
1170 break;
1171 }
1172 vehicle *const veh = &vp->vehicle();
1173
1174 // Try to find the last destination
1175 // This is mount point, not actual position
1176 point last_dest( INT_MIN, INT_MIN );
1177 if( !path.empty() && veh_pointer_or_null( here.veh_at( path[path.size() - 1] ) ) == veh ) {
1178 last_dest = vp->mount();
1179 }
1180
1181 // Prioritize last found path, then seats
1182 // Don't change spots if ours is nice
1183 int my_spot = -1;
1184 std::vector<std::pair<int, int> > seats;
1185 for( const vpart_reference &vp : veh->get_avail_parts( VPFLAG_BOARDABLE ) ) {
1186 const player *passenger = veh->get_passenger( vp.part_index() );
1187 if( passenger != this && passenger != nullptr ) {
1188 continue;
1189 }
1190
1191 // a seat is available if either unassigned or assigned to us
1192 auto available_seat = [&]( const vehicle_part & pt ) {
1193 if( !pt.is_seat() ) {
1194 return false;
1195 }
1196 const npc *who = pt.crew();
1197 return !who || who->getID() == getID();
1198 };
1199
1200 const vehicle_part &pt = vp.part();
1201
1202 int priority = 0;
1203
1204 if( vp.mount() == last_dest ) {
1205 // Shares mount point with last known path
1206 // We probably wanted to go there in the last turn
1207 priority = 4;
1208
1209 } else if( available_seat( pt ) ) {
1210 // Assuming player "owns" a sensible vehicle seats should be in good spots to occupy
1211 // Prefer our assigned seat if we have one
1212 const npc *who = pt.crew();
1213 priority = who && who->getID() == getID() ? 3 : 2;
1214
1215 } else if( vp.is_inside() ) {
1216 priority = 1;
1217 }
1218
1219 if( passenger == this ) {
1220 my_spot = priority;
1221 }
1222
1223 seats.push_back( std::make_pair( priority, static_cast<int>( vp.part_index() ) ) );
1224 }
1225
1226 if( my_spot >= 3 ) {
1227 // We won't get any better, so don't try
1228 move_pause();
1229 break;
1230 }
1231
1232 std::sort( seats.begin(), seats.end(),
1233 []( const std::pair<int, int> &l, const std::pair<int, int> &r ) {
1234 return l.first > r.first;
1235 } );
1236
1237 if( seats.empty() ) {
1238 // TODO: be angry at player, switch to wait or leave - for now pause
1239 move_pause();
1240 break;
1241 }
1242
1243 // Only check few best seats - pathfinding can get expensive
1244 const size_t try_max = std::min<size_t>( 4, seats.size() );
1245 for( size_t i = 0; i < try_max; i++ ) {
1246 if( seats[i].first <= my_spot ) {
1247 // We have a nicer spot than this
1248 // Note: this will make NPCs steal player's seat...
1249 break;
1250 }
1251
1252 const int cur_part = seats[i].second;
1253
1254 tripoint pp = veh->global_part_pos3( cur_part );
1255 update_path( pp, true );
1256 if( !path.empty() ) {
1257 // All is fine
1258 move_to_next();
1259 break;
1260 }
1261 }
1262
1263 // TODO: Check the rest
1264 move_pause();
1265 }
1266
1267 break;
1268 case npc_talk_to_player:
1269 talk_to_u();
1270 moves = 0;
1271 break;
1272
1273 case npc_mug_player:
1274 mug_player( player_character );
1275 break;
1276
1277 case npc_goto_destination:
1278 go_to_omt_destination();
1279 break;
1280
1281 case npc_avoid_friendly_fire:
1282 avoid_friendly_fire();
1283 break;
1284
1285 case npc_escape_explosion:
1286 escape_explosion();
1287 break;
1288
1289 case npc_player_activity:
1290 do_player_activity();
1291 break;
1292
1293 case npc_undecided:
1294 complain();
1295 move_pause();
1296 break;
1297
1298 case npc_noop:
1299 add_msg( m_debug, "%s skips turn (noop)", disp_name() );
1300 return;
1301
1302 default:
1303 debugmsg( "Unknown NPC action (%d)", action );
1304 }
1305
1306 if( oldmoves == moves ) {
1307 add_msg( m_debug, "NPC didn't use its moves. Action %s (%d).",
1308 npc_action_name( action ), action );
1309 }
1310}
1311
1312npc_action npc::method_of_fleeing()
1313{
1314 if( in_vehicle ) {
1315 return npc_undecided;
1316 }
1317 return npc_flee;
1318}
1319
1320npc_action npc::method_of_attack()
1321{
1322 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
1323 Creature *critter = current_target();
1324 if( critter == nullptr ) {
1325 // This function shouldn't be called...
1326 debugmsg( "Ran npc::method_of_attack without a target!" );
1327 return npc_pause;
1328 }
1329
1330 tripoint tar = critter->pos();
1331 int dist = rl_dist( pos(), tar );
1332 double danger = evaluate_enemy( *critter );
1333 const bool has_los = clear_shot_reach( pos(), tar, false );
1334 const bool same_z = tar.z == pos().z;
1335
1336 // TODO: Change the in_vehicle check to actual "are we driving" check
1337 const bool dont_move = in_vehicle || rules.engagement == combat_engagement::NO_MOVE ||
1338 rules.engagement == combat_engagement::FREE_FIRE;
1339 // NPCs engage in free fire can move to avoid allies, but not if they're in a vehicle
1340 const bool dont_move_ff = in_vehicle || rules.engagement == combat_engagement::NO_MOVE;
1341
1342 // if there's enough of a threat to be here, power up the combat CBMs
1343 activate_combat_cbms();
1344
1345 int ups_charges = charges_of( itype_UPS );
1346
1347 // get any suitable modes excluding melee, any forbidden to NPCs and those without ammo
1348 // if we require a silent weapon inappropriate modes are also removed
1349 // except in emergency only fire bursts if danger > 0.5 and don't shoot at all at harmless targets
1350 std::vector<std::pair<gun_mode_id, gun_mode>> modes;
1351 if( rules.has_flag( ally_rule::use_guns ) || !is_player_ally() ) {
1352 for( const auto &e : weapon.gun_all_modes() ) {
1353 modes.push_back( e );
1354 }
1355
1356 modes.erase( std::remove_if( modes.begin(), modes.end(),
1357 [&]( const std::pair<gun_mode_id, gun_mode> &e ) {
1358
1359 const auto &m = e.second;
1360 return m.melee() || m.flags.count( "NPC_AVOID" ) ||
1361 !m->ammo_sufficient( m.qty ) || !can_use( *m.target ) ||
1362 m->get_gun_ups_drain() > ups_charges ||
1363 ( ( danger <= ( m.qty == 1 ? 3.0 : 15.0 ) ) && !emergency() ) ||
1364 ( rules.has_flag( ally_rule::use_silent ) && is_player_ally() &&
1365 !m.target->is_silent() );
1366
1367 } ), modes.end() );
1368 }
1369
1370 // prefer modes that result in more total damage
1371 std::stable_sort( modes.begin(),
1372 modes.end(), [&]( const std::pair<gun_mode_id, gun_mode> &lhs,
1373 const std::pair<gun_mode_id, gun_mode> &rhs ) {
1374 return ( lhs.second->gun_damage().total_damage() * lhs.second.qty ) >
1375 ( rhs.second->gun_damage().total_damage() * rhs.second.qty );
1376 } );
1377
1378 const int cur_recoil = ranged::recoil_total( *this );
1379 // modes outside confident range should always be the last option(s)
1380 std::stable_sort( modes.begin(),
1381 modes.end(), [&]( const std::pair<gun_mode_id, gun_mode> &lhs,
1382 const std::pair<gun_mode_id, gun_mode> &rhs ) {
1383 return ( confident_gun_mode_range( lhs.second, cur_recoil ) >= dist ) >
1384 ( confident_gun_mode_range( rhs.second, cur_recoil ) >= dist );
1385 } );
1386
1387 if( emergency() && alt_attack() ) {
1388 add_msg( m_debug, "%s is trying an alternate attack", disp_name() );
1389 return npc_noop;
1390 }
1391
1392 // reach attacks are silent and consume no ammo so prefer these if available
1393 int reach_range = weapon.reach_range( *this );
1394 if( !trigdist ) {
1395 if( reach_range > 1 && reach_range >= dist && clear_shot_reach( pos(), tar ) ) {
1396 add_msg( m_debug, "%s is trying a reach attack", disp_name() );
1397 return npc_reach_attack;
1398 }
1399 } else {
1400 if( reach_range > 1 && reach_range >= std::round( trig_dist( pos(), tar ) ) &&
1401 clear_shot_reach( pos(), tar ) ) {
1402 add_msg( m_debug, "%s is trying a reach attack", disp_name() );
1403 return npc_reach_attack;
1404 }
1405 }
1406
1407 // if the best mode is within the confident range try for a shot
1408 if( !modes.empty() && sees( *critter ) && has_los &&
1409 confident_gun_mode_range( modes[ 0 ].second, cur_recoil ) >= dist ) {
1410 if( cbm_weapon_index > 0 && !weapon.ammo_sufficient() && can_reload_current() ) {
1411 add_msg( m_debug, "%s is reloading", disp_name() );
1412 return npc_reload;
1413 }
1414
1415 if( wont_hit_friend( tar, weapon, false ) ) {
1416 weapon.gun_set_mode( modes[ 0 ].first );
1417 add_msg( m_debug, "%s is trying to shoot someone", disp_name() );
1418 return npc_shoot;
1419
1420 } else {
1421 if( !dont_move_ff ) {
1422 add_msg( m_debug, "%s is trying to avoid friendly fire", disp_name() );
1423 return npc_avoid_friendly_fire;
1424 }
1425 }
1426 }
1427
1428 if( dist == 1 && same_z ) {
1429 add_msg( m_debug, "%s is trying a melle attack", disp_name() );
1430 return npc_melee;
1431 }
1432
1433 // don't mess with CBM weapons
1434 if( cbm_weapon_index < 0 ) {
1435 // TODO: Add a time check now that wielding takes a lot of time
1436 if( wield_better_weapon() ) {
1437 add_msg( m_debug, "%s is changing weapons", disp_name() );
1438 return npc_noop;
1439 }
1440
1441 if( !weapon.ammo_sufficient() && can_reload_current() ) {
1442 add_msg( m_debug, "%s is reloading", disp_name() );
1443 return npc_reload;
1444 }
1445 }
1446
1447 // TODO: Needs a check for transparent but non-passable tiles on the way
1448 if( !modes.empty() && sees( *critter ) &&
1449 ranged::aim_per_move( *this, weapon, recoil ) > 0 &&
1450 confident_shoot_range( weapon, ranged::get_most_accurate_sight( *this, weapon ) ) >= dist ) {
1451 add_msg( m_debug, "%s is aiming", disp_name() );
1452 if( critter->is_player() && player_character.sees( *this ) ) {
1453 add_msg( m_bad, _( "%s takes aim at you!" ), disp_name() );
1454 }
1455 return npc_aim;
1456 }
1457 add_msg( m_debug, "%s can't figure out what to do", disp_name() );
1458 return ( dont_move || !same_z ) ? npc_undecided : npc_melee;
1459}
1460
1461npc_action npc::address_needs()
1462{
1463 return address_needs( ai_cache.danger );
1464}
1465
1466static bool wants_to_reload( const npc &who, const item &it )
1467{
1468 if( !who.can_reload( it ) ) {
1469 return false;
1470 }
1471
1472 const int required = it.ammo_required();
1473 // TODO: Add bandolier check here, once they can be reloaded
1474 if( required < 1 && !it.is_magazine() ) {
1475 return false;
1476 }
1477
1478 const int remaining = it.ammo_remaining();
1479 return remaining < required || remaining < it.ammo_capacity();
1480}
1481
1482static bool wants_to_reload_with( const item &weap, const item &ammo )
1483{
1484 return !ammo.is_magazine() || ammo.ammo_remaining() > weap.ammo_remaining();
1485}
1486
1487item &npc::find_reloadable()
1488{
1489 if( get_npc_ai_info_cache( "reloadables" ) ) {
1490 return null_item_reference();
1491 }
1492 // Check wielded gun, non-wielded guns, mags and tools
1493 // TODO: Build a proper gun->mag->ammo DAG (Directed Acyclic Graph)
1494 // to avoid checking same properties over and over
1495 // TODO: Make this understand bandoliers, pouches etc.
1496 // TODO: Cache items checked for reloading to avoid re-checking same items every turn
1497 // TODO: Make it understand smaller and bigger magazines
1498 item *reloadable = nullptr;
1499 visit_items( [this, &reloadable]( item * node ) {
1500 if( !wants_to_reload( *this, *node ) ) {
1501 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
1502 }
1503 const auto it_loc = character_funcs::select_ammo( *this, *node ).ammo;
1504 if( it_loc && wants_to_reload_with( *node, *it_loc ) ) {
1505 reloadable = node;
1506 return VisitResponse::ABORT;
1507 }
1508
1509 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
1510 } );
1511
1512 if( reloadable != nullptr ) {
1513 return *reloadable;
1514 }
1515
1516 set_npc_ai_info_cache( "reloadables", 0.0 );
1517 return null_item_reference();
1518}
1519
1520const item &npc::find_reloadable() const
1521{
1522 return const_cast<const item &>( const_cast<npc *>( this )->find_reloadable() );
1523}
1524
1525bool npc::can_reload_current()
1526{
1527 if( !weapon.is_gun() || !wants_to_reload( *this, weapon ) ) {
1528 return false;
1529 }
1530
1531 return static_cast<bool>( find_usable_ammo( weapon ) );
1532}
1533
1534item_location npc::find_usable_ammo( const item &weap )
1535{
1536 if( !can_reload( weap ) ) {
1537 return item_location();
1538 }
1539
1540 auto loc = character_funcs::select_ammo( *this, weap ).ammo;
1541 if( !loc || !wants_to_reload_with( weap, *loc ) ) {
1542 return item_location();
1543 }
1544
1545 return loc;
1546}
1547
1548item_location npc::find_usable_ammo( const item &weap ) const
1549{
1550 return const_cast<npc *>( this )->find_usable_ammo( weap );
1551}
1552
1553void npc::adjust_power_cbms()
1554{
1555 if( !is_player_ally() || wants_to_recharge_cbm() ) {
1556 return;
1557 }
1558 for( const bionic_id &cbm_id : power_cbms ) {
1559 deactivate_bionic_by_id( cbm_id );
1560 }
1561}
1562
1563void npc::activate_combat_cbms()
1564{
1565 for( const bionic_id &cbm_id : defense_cbms ) {
1566 activate_bionic_by_id( cbm_id );
1567 }
1568 if( can_use_offensive_cbm() ) {
1569 for( const bionic_id &cbm_id : weapon_cbms ) {
1570 check_or_use_weapon_cbm( cbm_id );
1571 }
1572 }
1573}
1574
1575void npc::deactivate_combat_cbms()
1576{
1577 for( const bionic_id &cbm_id : defense_cbms ) {
1578 deactivate_bionic_by_id( cbm_id );
1579 }
1580 deactivate_bionic_by_id( bio_hydraulics );
1581 for( const bionic_id &cbm_id : weapon_cbms ) {
1582 deactivate_bionic_by_id( cbm_id );
1583 }
1584 cbm_weapon_index = -1;
1585}
1586
1587bool npc::activate_bionic_by_id( const bionic_id &cbm_id, bool eff_only )
1588{
1589 if( has_bionic( cbm_id ) ) {
1590 bionic &bio = get_bionic_state( cbm_id );
1591 if( !bio.powered ) {
1592 return activate_bionic( bio, eff_only );
1593 }
1594 }
1595 return false;
1596}
1597
1598bool npc::use_bionic_by_id( const bionic_id &cbm_id, bool eff_only )
1599{
1600 if( has_bionic( cbm_id ) ) {
1601 bionic &bio = get_bionic_state( cbm_id );
1602 if( bio.powered ) {
1603 return true;
1604 } else {
1605 return activate_bionic( bio, eff_only );
1606 }
1607 }
1608 return false;
1609}
1610
1611bool npc::deactivate_bionic_by_id( const bionic_id &cbm_id, bool eff_only )
1612{
1613 if( has_bionic( cbm_id ) ) {
1614 bionic &bio = get_bionic_state( cbm_id );
1615 if( bio.powered ) {
1616 return deactivate_bionic( bio, eff_only );
1617 }
1618 }
1619 return false;
1620}
1621
1622bool npc::wants_to_recharge_cbm()
1623{
1624 const units::energy curr_power = get_power_level();
1625 const float allowed_ratio = static_cast<int>( rules.cbm_recharge ) / 100.0f;
1626 const units::energy max_pow_allowed = get_max_power_level() * allowed_ratio;
1627
1628 if( curr_power < max_pow_allowed ) {
1629 for( const bionic_id &bid : get_fueled_bionics() ) {
1630 if( !has_active_bionic( bid ) ) {
1631 return true;
1632 }
1633 }
1634 return get_fueled_bionics().empty(); //NPC might have power CBM that doesn't use the json fuel_opts entry
1635 }
1636 return false;
1637}
1638
1639bool npc::can_use_offensive_cbm() const
1640{
1641 const float allowed_ratio = static_cast<int>( rules.cbm_reserve ) / 100.0f;
1642 return get_power_level() > get_max_power_level() * allowed_ratio;
1643}
1644
1645bool npc::consume_cbm_items( const std::function<bool( const item & )> &filter )
1646{
1647 invslice slice = inv.slice();
1648 int index = -1;
1649 for( size_t i = 0; i < slice.size(); i++ ) {
1650 const item &it = slice[i]->front();
1651 const item &real_item = it.is_container() ? it.contents.front() : it;
1652 if( filter( real_item ) ) {
1653 index = i;
1654 break;
1655 }
1656 }
1657 if( index < 0 ) {
1658 return false;
1659 }
1660 int old_moves = moves;
1661 item_location loc = item_location( *this, &i_at( index ) );
1662 consume( loc );
1663 // TODO: a more reliable check for whether item has been consumed
1664 return old_moves != moves;
1665}
1666
1667bool npc::recharge_cbm()
1668{
1669 // non-allied NPCs don't consume resources to recharge
1670 if( !is_player_ally() ) {
1671 mod_power_level( get_max_power_level() );
1672 return true;
1673 }
1674
1675 for( bionic_id &bid : get_fueled_bionics() ) {
1676 if( has_active_bionic( bid ) ) {
1677 continue;
1678 }
1679
1680 if( !get_fuel_available( bid ).empty() ) {
1681 use_bionic_by_id( bid );
1682 return true;
1683 } else {
1684 const std::function<bool( const item & )> fuel_filter = [bid]( const item & it ) {
1685 for( const itype_id &fid : bid->fuel_opts ) {
1686 return it.typeId() == fid || ( !it.is_container_empty() && it.contents.front().typeId() == fid );
1687 }
1688 return false;
1689 };
1690
1691 if( consume_cbm_items( fuel_filter ) ) {
1692 use_bionic_by_id( bid );
1693 return true;
1694 } else {
1695 const std::vector<itype_id> fuel_op = bid->fuel_opts;
1696 const bool need_alcohol =
1697 std::find( fuel_op.begin(), fuel_op.end(), itype_chem_ethanol ) !=
1698 fuel_op.end() ||
1699 std::find( fuel_op.begin(), fuel_op.end(), itype_chem_methanol ) !=
1700 fuel_op.end() ||
1701 std::find( fuel_op.begin(), fuel_op.end(), itype_denat_alcohol ) !=
1702 fuel_op.end();
1703
1704 if( std::find( fuel_op.begin(), fuel_op.end(), itype_battery ) != fuel_op.end() ) {
1705 complain_about( "need_batteries", 3_hours, "<need_batteries>", false );
1706 } else if( need_alcohol ) {
1707 complain_about( "need_booze", 3_hours, "<need_booze>", false );
1708 } else {
1709 complain_about( "need_fuel", 3_hours, "<need_fuel>", false );
1710 }
1711 }
1712 }
1713 }
1714
1715 if( use_bionic_by_id( bio_furnace ) ) {
1716 const std::function<bool( const item & )> furnace_filter = []( const item & it ) {
1717 return it.typeId() == itype_id( "withered" ) || it.typeId() == itype_id( "file" ) ||
1718 it.has_flag( "FIREWOOD" );
1719 };
1720 if( consume_cbm_items( furnace_filter ) ) {
1721 return true;
1722 } else {
1723 complain_about( "need_junk", 3_hours, "<need_junk>", false );
1724 }
1725 }
1726
1727 if( use_bionic_by_id( bio_reactor ) || use_bionic_by_id( bio_advreactor ) ) {
1728 const std::function<bool( const item & )> reactor_filter = []( const item & it ) {
1729 return it.is_ammo() && ( it.ammo_type() == ammo_plutonium ||
1730 it.ammo_type() == ammo_reactor_slurry );
1731 };
1732 if( consume_cbm_items( reactor_filter ) ) {
1733 return true;
1734 } else {
1735 complain_about( "need_radioactives", 3_hours, "<need_radioactives>", false );
1736 }
1737 }
1738
1739 return false;
1740}
1741
1742healing_options npc::patient_assessment( const Character &c )
1743{
1744 healing_options try_to_fix;
1745 try_to_fix.clear_all();
1746
1747 for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, bodypart> &elem : c.get_body() ) {
1748
1749 if( c.has_effect( effect_bleed, elem.first->token ) ) {
1750 try_to_fix.bleed = true;
1751 }
1752
1753 if( c.has_effect( effect_bite, elem.first->token ) ) {
1754 try_to_fix.bite = true;
1755 }
1756
1757 if( c.has_effect( effect_infected, elem.first->token ) ) {
1758 try_to_fix.infect = true;
1759 }
1760 int part_threshold = 75;
1761 if( elem.first == bodypart_str_id( "head" ) ) {
1762 part_threshold += 20;
1763 } else if( elem.first == bodypart_str_id( "torso" ) ) {
1764 part_threshold += 10;
1765 }
1766 part_threshold = std::min( 80, part_threshold );
1767 part_threshold = part_threshold * elem.second.get_hp_max() / 100;
1768
1769 if( elem.second.get_hp_cur() <= part_threshold ) {
1770 if( !c.has_effect( effect_bandaged, elem.first->token ) ) {
1771 try_to_fix.bandage = true;
1772 }
1773 if( !c.has_effect( effect_disinfected, elem.first->token ) ) {
1774 try_to_fix.disinfect = true;
1775 }
1776 }
1777 }
1778 return try_to_fix;
1779}
1780
1781npc_action npc::address_needs( float danger )
1782{
1783 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
1784 // rng because NPCs are not meant to be hypervigilant hawks that notice everything
1785 // and swing into action with alarming alacrity.
1786 // no sometimes they are just looking the other way, sometimes they hestitate.
1787 // ( also we can get huge performance boosts )
1788 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
1789 healing_options try_to_fix_me = patient_assessment( *this );
1790 if( try_to_fix_me.any_true() ) {
1791 if( !use_bionic_by_id( bio_nanobots ) ) {
1792 ai_cache.can_heal = has_healing_options( try_to_fix_me );
1793 if( ai_cache.can_heal.any_true() ) {
1794 return npc_heal;
1795 }
1796 }
1797 } else {
1798 deactivate_bionic_by_id( bio_nanobots );
1799 }
1800 if( get_skill_level( skill_firstaid ) > 0 ) {
1801 if( is_player_ally() ) {
1802 healing_options try_to_fix_other = patient_assessment( player_character );
1803 if( try_to_fix_other.any_true() ) {
1804 ai_cache.can_heal = has_healing_options( try_to_fix_other );
1805 if( ai_cache.can_heal.any_true() ) {
1806 ai_cache.ally = g->shared_from( player_character );
1807 return npc_heal_player;
1808 }
1809 }
1810 }
1811 for( const npc &guy : g->all_npcs() ) {
1812 if( &guy == this || !guy.is_ally( *this ) || guy.posz() != posz() || !sees( guy ) ) {
1813 continue;
1814 }
1815 healing_options try_to_fix_other = patient_assessment( guy );
1816 if( try_to_fix_other.any_true() ) {
1817 ai_cache.can_heal = has_healing_options( try_to_fix_other );
1818 if( ai_cache.can_heal.any_true() ) {
1819 ai_cache.ally = g->shared_from( guy );
1820 return npc_heal_player;
1821 }
1822 }
1823 }
1824 }
1825 }
1826
1827 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
1828 if( get_perceived_pain() >= 15 ) {
1829 if( !activate_bionic_by_id( bio_painkiller ) && has_painkiller() && !took_painkiller() ) {
1830 return npc_use_painkiller;
1831 }
1832 } else {
1833 deactivate_bionic_by_id( bio_painkiller );
1834 }
1835 }
1836
1837 if( one_in( 3 ) && can_reload_current() ) {
1838 return npc_reload;
1839 }
1840
1841 item &reloadable = find_reloadable();
1842 if( !reloadable.is_null() ) {
1843 do_reload( reloadable );
1844 return npc_noop;
1845 }
1846
1847 // Extreme thirst or hunger, bypass safety check.
1848 if( get_thirst() > thirst_levels::dehydrated ||
1849 get_stored_kcal() + stomach.get_calories() < max_stored_kcal() * 0.75 ) {
1850 if( consume_food_from_camp() ) {
1851 return npc_noop;
1852 }
1853 if( consume_food() ) {
1854 return npc_noop;
1855 }
1856 }
1857 //Does the hallucination needs to disappear ?
1858 if( is_hallucination() && player_character.sees( *this ) ) {
1859 if( !player_character.has_effect( effect_hallu ) ) {
1860 die( nullptr );
1861 }
1862 }
1863
1864 if( danger > NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW ) {
1865 return npc_undecided;
1866 }
1867
1868 if( one_in( 3 ) && ( get_thirst() > thirst_levels::thirsty ||
1869 get_stored_kcal() + stomach.get_calories() < max_stored_kcal() * 0.95 ) ) {
1870 if( consume_food_from_camp() ) {
1871 return npc_noop;
1872 }
1873 if( consume_food() ) {
1874 return npc_noop;
1875 }
1876 }
1877
1878 if( one_in( 3 ) && wants_to_recharge_cbm() && recharge_cbm() ) {
1879 return npc_noop;
1880 }
1881
1882 if( one_in( 3 ) && find_corpse_to_pulp() ) {
1883 if( !do_pulp() ) {
1884 move_to_next();
1885 }
1886 return npc_noop;
1887 }
1888
1889 if( one_in( 3 ) && adjust_worn() ) {
1890 return npc_noop;
1891 }
1892
1893 const auto could_sleep = [&]() {
1894 if( danger <= 0.01 ) {
1895 if( get_fatigue() >= fatigue_levels::tired ) {
1896 return true;
1897 } else if( is_walking_with() && player_character.in_sleep_state() &&
1898 get_fatigue() > ( fatigue_levels::tired / 2 ) ) {
1899 return true;
1900 }
1901 }
1902 return false;
1903 };
1904 // TODO: More risky attempts at sleep when exhausted
1905 if( one_in( 3 ) && could_sleep() ) {
1906 if( !is_player_ally() ) {
1907 // TODO: Make tired NPCs handle sleep offscreen
1908 set_fatigue( 0 );
1909 return npc_undecided;
1910 }
1911
1912 if( rules.has_flag( ally_rule::allow_sleep ) || get_fatigue() > fatigue_levels::massive ) {
1913 return npc_sleep;
1914 } else if( player_character.in_sleep_state() ) {
1915 // TODO: "Guard me while I sleep" command
1916 return npc_sleep;
1917 }
1918 }
1919 // TODO: Mutation & trait related needs
1920 // e.g. finding glasses; getting out of sunlight if we're an albino; etc.
1921
1922 return npc_undecided;
1923}
1924
1925npc_action npc::address_player()
1926{
1927 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
1928 if( ( attitude == NPCATT_TALK ) && sees( player_character ) ) {
1929 if( player_character.in_sleep_state() ) {
1930 // Leave sleeping characters alone.
1931 return npc_undecided;
1932 }
1933 if( rl_dist( pos(), player_character.pos() ) <= 6 ) {
1934 return npc_talk_to_player; // Close enough to talk to you
1935 } else {
1936 if( one_in( 10 ) ) {
1937 say( "<lets_talk>" );
1938 }
1939 return npc_follow_player;
1940 }
1941 }
1942
1943 if( attitude == NPCATT_MUG && sees( player_character ) ) {
1944 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
1945 say( _( "Don't move a <swear> muscle" ) );
1946 }
1947 return npc_mug_player;
1948 }
1949
1950 if( attitude == NPCATT_WAIT_FOR_LEAVE ) {
1951 patience--;
1952 if( patience <= 0 ) {
1953 patience = 0;
1954 set_attitude( NPCATT_KILL );
1955 return npc_noop;
1956 }
1957 return npc_undecided;
1958 }
1959
1960 if( attitude == NPCATT_FLEE_TEMP ) {
1961 return npc_flee;
1962 }
1963
1964 if( attitude == NPCATT_LEAD ) {
1965 if( rl_dist( pos(), player_character.pos() ) >= 12 || !sees( player_character ) ) {
1966 int intense = get_effect_int( effect_catch_up );
1967 if( intense < 10 ) {
1968 say( "<keep_up>" );
1969 add_effect( effect_catch_up, 5_turns );
1970 return npc_pause;
1971 } else {
1972 say( "<im_leaving_you>" );
1973 set_attitude( NPCATT_NULL );
1974 return npc_pause;
1975 }
1976 } else if( has_omt_destination() ) {
1977 return npc_goto_destination;
1978 } else { // At goal. Now, waiting on nearby player
1979 return npc_pause;
1980 }
1981 }
1982 return npc_undecided;
1983}
1984
1985npc_action npc::long_term_goal_action()
1986{
1987 add_msg( m_debug, "long_term_goal_action()" );
1988
1989 if( mission == NPC_MISSION_SHOPKEEP || mission == NPC_MISSION_SHELTER || ( is_player_ally() &&
1990 mission != NPC_MISSION_TRAVELLING ) ) {
1991 return npc_pause; // Shopkeepers just stay put.
1992 }
1993
1994 if( !has_omt_destination() ) {
1995 set_omt_destination();
1996 }
1997
1998 if( has_omt_destination() ) {
1999 if( mission != NPC_MISSION_TRAVELLING ) {
2000 set_mission( NPC_MISSION_TRAVELLING );
2001 set_attitude( attitude );
2002 }
2003 return npc_goto_destination;
2004 }
2005
2006 return npc_undecided;
2007}
2008
2009double npc::confidence_mult() const
2010{
2011 if( !is_player_ally() ) {
2012 return 1.0f;
2013 }
2014
2015 switch( rules.aim ) {
2016 case aim_rule::WHEN_CONVENIENT:
2017 return emergency() ? 1.5f : 1.0f;
2018 case aim_rule::SPRAY:
2019 return 2.0f;
2020 case aim_rule::PRECISE:
2021 return emergency() ? 1.0f : 0.75f;
2022 case aim_rule::STRICTLY_PRECISE:
2023 return 0.5f;
2024 }
2025
2026 return 1.0f;
2027}
2028
2029int npc::confident_shoot_range( const item &it, int recoil ) const
2030{
2031 int res = 0;
2032 if( !it.is_gun() ) {
2033 return res;
2034 }
2035 if( confident_range_cache ) {
2036 return *confident_range_cache;
2037 }
2038 for( const auto &m : it.gun_all_modes() ) {
2039 res = std::max( res, confident_gun_mode_range( m.second, recoil ) );
2040 }
2041 return res;
2042}
2043
2044int npc::confident_gun_mode_range( const gun_mode &gun, int at_recoil ) const
2045{
2046 if( !gun || gun.melee() ) {
2047 return 0;
2048 }
2049
2050 // Same calculation as in @ref item::info
2051 // TODO: Extract into common method
2052 double max_dispersion = ranged::get_weapon_dispersion( *this, *gun.target ).max() + at_recoil;
2053 double even_chance_range = range_with_even_chance_of_good_hit( max_dispersion );
2054 double confident_range = even_chance_range * confidence_mult();
2055 add_msg( m_debug, "confident_gun (%s<=%.2f) at %.1f", gun.name(), confident_range,
2056 max_dispersion );
2057 return std::max<int>( confident_range, 1 );
2058}
2059
2060int npc::confident_throw_range( const item &thrown, Creature *target ) const
2061{
2062 double average_dispersion = ranged::throwing_dispersion( *this, thrown, target, false ) / 2.0;
2063 double even_chance_range = ( target == nullptr ? 0.5 : target->ranged_target_size() ) /
2064 average_dispersion;
2065 double confident_range = even_chance_range * confidence_mult();
2066 add_msg( m_debug, "confident_throw_range == %d", static_cast<int>( confident_range ) );
2067 return static_cast<int>( confident_range );
2068}
2069
2070// Index defaults to -1, i.e., wielded weapon
2071bool npc::wont_hit_friend( const tripoint &tar, const item &it, bool throwing ) const
2072{
2073 // TODO: Get actual dispersion instead of extracting it (badly) from confident range
2074 int confident = throwing ?
2075 confident_throw_range( it, nullptr ) :
2076 confident_shoot_range( it, ranged::recoil_total( *this ) );
2077 // if there is no confidence at using weapon, it's not used at range
2078 // zero confidence leads to divide by zero otherwise
2079 if( confident < 1 ) {
2080 return true;
2081 }
2082
2083 if( rl_dist( pos(), tar ) == 1 ) {
2084 return true; // If we're *really* sure that our aim is dead-on
2085 }
2086
2087 units::angle target_angle = coord_to_angle( pos(), tar );
2088
2089 // TODO: Base on dispersion
2090 units::angle safe_angle = 30_degrees;
2091
2092 for( const auto &fr : ai_cache.friends ) {
2093 const shared_ptr_fast<Creature> ally_p = fr.lock();
2094 if( !ally_p ) {
2095 continue;
2096 }
2097 const Creature &ally = *ally_p;
2098
2099 // TODO: Extract common functions with turret target selection
2100 units::angle safe_angle_ally = safe_angle;
2101 int ally_dist = rl_dist( pos(), ally.pos() );
2102 if( ally_dist < 3 ) {
2103 safe_angle_ally += ( 3 - ally_dist ) * 30_degrees;
2104 }
2105
2106 units::angle ally_angle = coord_to_angle( pos(), ally.pos() );
2107 units::angle angle_diff = units::fabs( ally_angle - target_angle );
2108 angle_diff = std::min( 360_degrees - angle_diff, angle_diff );
2109 if( angle_diff < safe_angle_ally ) {
2110 // TODO: Disable NPC whining is it's other NPC who prevents aiming
2111 return false;
2112 }
2113 }
2114
2115 return true;
2116}
2117
2118bool npc::enough_time_to_reload( const item &gun ) const
2119{
2120 int rltime = item_reload_cost( gun, item( gun.ammo_default() ),
2121 gun.ammo_capacity() );
2122 const float turns_til_reloaded = static_cast<float>( rltime ) / get_speed();
2123
2124 const Creature *target = current_target();
2125 if( target == nullptr ) {
2126 // No target, plenty of time to reload
2127 return true;
2128 }
2129
2130 const auto distance = rl_dist( pos(), target->pos() );
2131 const float target_speed = target->speed_rating();
2132 const float turns_til_reached = distance / target_speed;
2133 if( target->is_player() || target->is_npc() ) {
2134 auto &c = dynamic_cast<const Character &>( *target );
2135 // TODO: Allow reloading if the player has a low accuracy gun
2136 if( sees( c ) && c.weapon.is_gun() && rltime > 200 &&
2137 c.weapon.gun_range( true ) > distance + turns_til_reloaded / target_speed ) {
2138 // Don't take longer than 2 turns if player has a gun
2139 return false;
2140 }
2141 }
2142
2143 // TODO: Handle monsters with ranged attacks and players with CBMs
2144 return turns_til_reloaded < turns_til_reached;
2145}
2146
2147void npc::aim()
2148{
2149 double aim_amount = ranged::aim_per_move( *this, weapon, recoil );
2150 while( aim_amount > 0 && recoil > 0 && moves > 0 ) {
2151 moves--;
2152 recoil -= aim_amount;
2153 recoil = std::max( 0.0, recoil );
2154 aim_amount = ranged::aim_per_move( *this, weapon, recoil );
2155 }
2156}
2157
2158bool npc::update_path( const tripoint &p, const bool no_bashing, bool force )
2159{
2160 if( p == pos() ) {
2161 path.clear();
2162 return true;
2163 }
2164
2165 while( !path.empty() && path[0] == pos() ) {
2166 path.erase( path.begin() );
2167 }
2168
2169 if( !path.empty() ) {
2170 const tripoint &last = path[path.size() - 1];
2171 if( last == p && ( path[0].z != posz() || rl_dist( path[0], pos() ) <= 1 ) ) {
2172 // Our path already leads to that point, no need to recalculate
2173 return true;
2174 }
2175 }
2176
2177 auto new_path = get_map().route( pos(), p, get_pathfinding_settings( no_bashing ),
2178 get_path_avoid() );
2179 if( new_path.empty() ) {
2180 if( !ai_cache.sound_alerts.empty() ) {
2181 ai_cache.sound_alerts.erase( ai_cache.sound_alerts.begin() );
2182 add_msg( m_debug, "failed to path to sound alert %d,%d,%d->%d,%d,%d",
2183 posx(), posy(), posz(), p.x, p.y, p.z );
2184 }
2185 add_msg( m_debug, "Failed to path %d,%d,%d->%d,%d,%d",
2186 posx(), posy(), posz(), p.x, p.y, p.z );
2187 }
2188
2189 while( !new_path.empty() && new_path[0] == pos() ) {
2190 new_path.erase( new_path.begin() );
2191 }
2192
2193 if( !new_path.empty() || force ) {
2194 path = std::move( new_path );
2195 return true;
2196 }
2197
2198 return false;
2199}
2200
2201bool npc::can_open_door( const tripoint &p, const bool inside ) const
2202{
2203 return !rules.has_flag( ally_rule::avoid_doors ) && get_map().open_door( p, inside, true );
2204}
2205
2206bool npc::can_move_to( const tripoint &p, bool no_bashing ) const
2207{
2208 map &here = get_map();
2209 // Allow moving into any bashable spots, but penalize them during pathing
2210 // Doors are not passable for hallucinations
2211 return( rl_dist( pos(), p ) <= 1 && here.has_floor( p ) && !g->is_dangerous_tile( p ) &&
2212 ( here.passable( p ) || ( can_open_door( p, !here.is_outside( pos() ) ) && !is_hallucination() ) ||
2213 ( !no_bashing && here.bash_rating( smash_ability(), p ) > 0 ) )
2214 );
2215}
2216
2217void npc::move_to( const tripoint &pt, bool no_bashing, std::set<tripoint> *nomove )
2218{
2219 tripoint p = pt;
2220 map &here = get_map();
2221 if( sees_dangerous_field( p )
2222 || ( nomove != nullptr && nomove->find( p ) != nomove->end() ) ) {
2223 // Move to a neighbor field instead, if possible.
2224 // Maybe this code already exists somewhere?
2225 auto other_points = here.get_dir_circle( pos(), p );
2226 for( const tripoint &ot : other_points ) {
2227 if( could_move_onto( ot )
2228 && ( nomove == nullptr || nomove->find( ot ) == nomove->end() ) ) {
2229
2230 p = ot;
2231 break;
2232 }
2233 }
2234 }
2235
2236 recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
2237
2238 if( has_effect( effect_stunned ) ) {
2239 p.x = rng( posx() - 1, posx() + 1 );
2240 p.y = rng( posy() - 1, posy() + 1 );
2241 p.z = posz();
2242 }
2243
2244 // nomove is used to resolve recursive invocation, so reset destination no
2245 // matter it was changed by stunned effect or not.
2246 if( nomove != nullptr && nomove->find( p ) != nomove->end() ) {
2247 p = pos();
2248 }
2249
2250 // "Long steps" are allowed when crossing z-levels
2251 // Stairs teleport the player too
2252 if( rl_dist( pos(), p ) > 1 && p.z == posz() ) {
2253 // On the same level? Not so much. Something weird happened
2254 path.clear();
2255 move_pause();
2256 }
2257
2258 if( here.obstructed_by_vehicle_rotation( pos(), p ) ) {
2259 move_pause();
2260 return;
2261 }
2262
2263 bool attacking = false;
2264 if( g->critter_at<monster>( p ) ) {
2265 attacking = true;
2266 }
2267 if( !move_effects( attacking ) ) {
2268 mod_moves( -100 );
2269 return;
2270 }
2271
2272 Creature *critter = g->critter_at( p );
2273 if( critter != nullptr ) {
2274 if( critter == this ) { // We're just pausing!
2275 move_pause();
2276 return;
2277 }
2278 const auto att = attitude_to( *critter );
2279 if( att == A_HOSTILE ) {
2280 if( !no_bashing ) {
2281 warn_about( "cant_flee", 5_turns + rng( 0, 5 ) * 1_turns );
2282 melee_attack( *critter, true );
2283 } else {
2284 move_pause();
2285 }
2286
2287 return;
2288 }
2289
2290 if( critter->is_avatar() ) {
2291 say( "<let_me_pass>" );
2292 }
2293
2294 // Let NPCs push each other when non-hostile
2295 // TODO: Have them attack each other when hostile
2296 npc *np = dynamic_cast<npc *>( critter );
2297 if( np != nullptr && !np->in_sleep_state() ) {
2298 std::unique_ptr<std::set<tripoint>> newnomove;
2299 std::set<tripoint> *realnomove;
2300 if( nomove != nullptr ) {
2301 realnomove = nomove;
2302 } else {
2303 // create the no-move list
2304 newnomove = std::make_unique<std::set<tripoint>>();
2305 realnomove = newnomove.get();
2306 }
2307 // other npcs should not try to move into this npc anymore,
2308 // so infinite loop can be avoided.
2309 realnomove->insert( pos() );
2310 say( "<let_me_pass>" );
2311 np->move_away_from( pos(), true, realnomove );
2312 // if we moved NPC, readjust their path, so NPCs don't jostle each other out of their activity paths.
2313 if( np->attitude == NPCATT_ACTIVITY ) {
2314 std::vector<tripoint> activity_route = np->get_auto_move_route();
2315 if( !activity_route.empty() && !np->has_destination_activity() ) {
2316 tripoint final_destination;
2317 if( destination_point ) {
2318 final_destination = here.getlocal( *destination_point );
2319 } else {
2320 final_destination = activity_route.back();
2321 }
2322 np->update_path( final_destination );
2323 }
2324 }
2325 }
2326
2327 if( critter->pos() == p ) {
2328 move_pause();
2329 return;
2330 }
2331 }
2332
2333 // Boarding moving vehicles is fine, unboarding isn't
2334 bool moved = false;
2335 if( const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( pos() ) ) {
2336 const optional_vpart_position ovp = here.veh_at( p );
2337 if( vp->vehicle().is_moving() &&
2338 ( veh_pointer_or_null( ovp ) != veh_pointer_or_null( vp ) ||
2339 !ovp.part_with_feature( VPFLAG_BOARDABLE, true ) ) ) {
2340 move_pause();
2341 return;
2342 }
2343 }
2344
2345 if( p.z != posz() ) {
2346 // Z-level move
2347 // For now just teleport to the destination
2348 // TODO: Make it properly find the tile to move to
2349 if( is_mounted() ) {
2350 move_pause();
2351 return;
2352 }
2353 moves -= 100;
2354 moved = true;
2355 } else if( here.passable( p ) && !here.has_flag( "DOOR", p ) ) {
2356 bool diag = trigdist && posx() != p.x && posy() != p.y;
2357 if( is_mounted() ) {
2358 const double base_moves = run_cost( here.combined_movecost( pos(), p ),
2359 diag ) * 100.0 / mounted_creature->get_speed();
2360 const double encumb_moves = get_weight() / 4800.0_gram;
2361 moves -= static_cast<int>( std::ceil( base_moves + encumb_moves ) );
2362 if( mounted_creature->has_flag( MF_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
2363 mounted_creature->use_mech_power( -1 );
2364 }
2365 } else {
2366 moves -= run_cost( here.combined_movecost( pos(), p ), diag );
2367 }
2368 moved = true;
2369 } else if( here.open_door( p, !here.is_outside( pos() ), true ) ) {
2370 if( !is_hallucination() ) { // hallucinations don't open doors
2371 here.open_door( p, !here.is_outside( pos() ) );
2372 moves -= 100;
2373 } else { // hallucinations teleport through doors
2374 moves -= 100;
2375 moved = true;
2376 }
2377 } else if( get_dex() > 1 && here.has_flag_ter_or_furn( "CLIMBABLE", p ) ) {
2378 ///\EFFECT_DEX_NPC increases chance to climb CLIMBABLE furniture or terrain
2379 int climb = get_dex();
2380 if( one_in( climb ) ) {
2381 add_msg_if_npc( m_neutral, _( "%1$s tries to climb the %2$s but slips." ), name,
2382 here.tername( p ) );
2383 moves -= 400;
2384 } else {
2385 add_msg_if_npc( m_neutral, _( "%1$s climbs over the %2$s." ), name, here.tername( p ) );
2386 moves -= ( 500 - ( rng( 0, climb ) * 20 ) );
2387 moved = true;
2388 }
2389 } else if( !no_bashing && smash_ability() > 0 && here.is_bashable( p ) &&
2390 here.bash_rating( smash_ability(), p ) > 0 ) {
2391 moves -= !is_armed() ? 80 : weapon.attack_cost() * 0.8;
2392 here.bash( p, smash_ability() );
2393 } else {
2394 if( attitude == NPCATT_MUG ||
2395 attitude == NPCATT_KILL ||
2396 attitude == NPCATT_WAIT_FOR_LEAVE ) {
2397 set_attitude( NPCATT_FLEE_TEMP );
2398 }
2399
2400 moves = 0;
2401 }
2402
2403 if( moved ) {
2404 const tripoint old_pos = pos();
2405 setpos( p );
2406 if( old_pos.x - p.x < 0 ) {
2407 facing = FD_RIGHT;
2408 } else {
2409 facing = FD_LEFT;
2410 }
2411 if( is_mounted() ) {
2412 if( mounted_creature->pos() != pos() ) {
2413 mounted_creature->setpos( pos() );
2414 mounted_creature->facing = facing;
2415 mounted_creature->process_triggers();
2416 here.creature_in_field( *mounted_creature );
2417 here.creature_on_trap( *mounted_creature );
2418 }
2419 }
2420 if( here.has_flag( "UNSTABLE", pos() ) ) {
2421 add_effect( effect_bouldering, 1_turns, num_bp );
2422 } else if( has_effect( effect_bouldering ) ) {
2423 remove_effect( effect_bouldering );
2424 }
2425
2426 if( here.has_flag_ter_or_furn( TFLAG_NO_SIGHT, pos() ) ) {
2427 add_effect( effect_no_sight, 1_turns, num_bp );
2428 } else if( has_effect( effect_no_sight ) ) {
2429 remove_effect( effect_no_sight );
2430 }
2431
2432 if( in_vehicle ) {
2433 here.unboard_vehicle( old_pos );
2434 }
2435
2436 // Close doors behind self (if you can)
2437 if( ( rules.has_flag( ally_rule::close_doors ) && is_player_ally() ) && !is_hallucination() ) {
2438 doors::close_door( here, *this, old_pos );
2439 }
2440
2441 if( here.veh_at( p ).part_with_feature( VPFLAG_BOARDABLE, true ) ) {
2442 here.board_vehicle( p, this );
2443 }
2444
2445 here.creature_on_trap( *this );
2446 here.creature_in_field( *this );
2447 }
2448}
2449
2450void npc::move_to_next()
2451{
2452 while( !path.empty() && pos() == path[0] ) {
2453 path.erase( path.begin() );
2454 }
2455
2456 if( path.empty() ) {
2457 add_msg( m_debug, "npc::move_to_next() called with an empty path or path "
2458 "containing only current position" );
2459 move_pause();
2460 return;
2461 }
2462
2463 move_to( path[0] );
2464 if( !path.empty() && pos() == path[0] ) { // Move was successful
2465 path.erase( path.begin() );
2466 }
2467}
2468
2469void npc::avoid_friendly_fire()
2470{
2471 // TODO: To parameter
2472 const tripoint &tar = current_target()->pos();
2473 // Calculate center of weight of friends and move away from that
2474 tripoint center;
2475 for( const auto &fr : ai_cache.friends ) {
2476 if( shared_ptr_fast<Creature> fr_p = fr.lock() ) {
2477 center += fr_p->pos();
2478 }
2479 }
2480
2481 float friend_count = ai_cache.friends.size();
2482 center.x = std::round( center.x / friend_count );
2483 center.y = std::round( center.y / friend_count );
2484 center.z = std::round( center.z / friend_count );
2485
2486 std::vector<tripoint> candidates = closest_points_first( pos(), 1 );
2487 candidates.erase( candidates.begin() );
2488 std::sort( candidates.begin(), candidates.end(),
2489 [&tar, &center]( const tripoint & l, const tripoint & r ) {
2490 return ( rl_dist( l, tar ) - rl_dist( l, center ) ) <
2491 ( rl_dist( r, tar ) - rl_dist( r, center ) );
2492 } );
2493
2494 for( const auto &pt : candidates ) {
2495 if( can_move_to( pt ) ) {
2496 move_to( pt );
2497 return;
2498 }
2499 }
2500
2501 /* If we're still in the function at this point, maneuvering can't help us. So,
2502 * might as well address some needs.
2503 * We pass a <danger> value of NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW + 1 so that we won't start
2504 * eating food (or, god help us, sleeping).
2505 */
2506 npc_action action = address_needs( NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW + 1 );
2507 if( action == npc_undecided ) {
2508 move_pause();
2509 }
2510 execute_action( action );
2511}
2512
2513void npc::escape_explosion()
2514{
2515 if( ai_cache.dangerous_explosives.empty() ) {
2516 return;
2517 }
2518
2519 warn_about( "explosion", 1_minutes );
2520
2521 move_away_from( ai_cache.dangerous_explosives, true );
2522}
2523
2524void npc::move_away_from( const tripoint &pt, bool no_bash_atk, std::set<tripoint> *nomove )
2525{
2526 tripoint best_pos = pos();
2527 int best = -1;
2528 int chance = 2;
2529 map &here = get_map();
2530 for( const tripoint &p : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 1 ) ) {
2531 if( nomove != nullptr && nomove->find( p ) != nomove->end() ) {
2532 continue;
2533 }
2534
2535 if( p == pos() ) {
2536 continue;
2537 }
2538
2539 if( p == get_player_character().pos() ) {
2540 continue;
2541 }
2542
2543 const int cost = here.combined_movecost( pos(), p );
2544 if( cost <= 0 ) {
2545 continue;
2546 }
2547
2548 const int dst = std::abs( p.x - pt.x ) + std::abs( p.y - pt.y ) + std::abs( p.z - pt.z );
2549 const int val = dst * 1000 / cost;
2550 if( val > best && can_move_to( p, no_bash_atk ) ) {
2551 best_pos = p;
2552 best = val;
2553 chance = 2;
2554 } else if( ( val == best && one_in( chance ) ) && can_move_to( p, no_bash_atk ) ) {
2555 best_pos = p;
2556 best = val;
2557 chance++;
2558 }
2559 }
2560
2561 move_to( best_pos, no_bash_atk, nomove );
2562}
2563
2564bool npc::find_job_to_perform()
2565{
2566 for( activity_id &elem : job.get_prioritised_vector() ) {
2567 if( job.get_priority_of_job( elem ) == 0 ) {
2568 continue;
2569 }
2570 player_activity scan_act = player_activity( elem );
2571 if( elem == activity_id( "ACT_MOVE_LOOT" ) ) {
2572 assign_activity( elem );
2573 } else if( generic_multi_activity_handler( scan_act, *this->as_player(), true ) ) {
2574 assign_activity( elem );
2575 return true;
2576 }
2577 }
2578 return false;
2579}
2580
2581void npc::worker_downtime()
2582{
2583 map &here = get_map();
2584 // are we already in a chair
2585 if( here.has_flag_furn( "CAN_SIT", pos() ) ) {
2586 // just chill here
2587 move_pause();
2588 return;
2589 }
2590 // already know of a chair, go there
2591 if( chair_pos != tripoint_min ) {
2592 if( here.has_flag_furn( "CAN_SIT", here.getlocal( chair_pos ) ) ) {
2593 update_path( here.getlocal( chair_pos ) );
2594 if( pos() == here.getlocal( chair_pos ) || path.empty() ) {
2595 move_pause();
2596 path.clear();
2597 } else {
2598 move_to_next();
2599 }
2600 wander_pos = tripoint_min;
2601 return;
2602 } else {
2603 chair_pos = tripoint_min;
2604 }
2605 } else {
2606 // find a chair
2607 if( !is_mounted() ) {
2608 for( const tripoint &elem : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 30 ) ) {
2609 if( here.has_flag_furn( "CAN_SIT", elem ) && !g->critter_at( elem ) && could_move_onto( elem ) &&
2610 here.point_within_camp( here.getabs( elem ) ) ) {
2611 // this one will do
2612 chair_pos = here.getabs( elem );
2613 return;
2614 }
2615 }
2616 }
2617 }
2618 // we got here if there are no chairs available.
2619 // wander back to near the bulletin board of the camp.
2620 if( wander_pos != tripoint_min ) {
2621 update_path( here.getlocal( wander_pos ) );
2622 if( pos() == here.getlocal( wander_pos ) || path.empty() ) {
2623 move_pause();
2624 path.clear();
2625 if( one_in( 30 ) ) {
2626 wander_pos = tripoint_min;
2627 }
2628 } else {
2629 move_to_next();
2630 }
2631 return;
2632 }
2633 if( assigned_camp ) {
2634 cata::optional<basecamp *> bcp = overmap_buffer.find_camp( ( *assigned_camp ).xy() );
2635 if( !bcp ) {
2636 assigned_camp = cata::nullopt;
2637 move_pause();
2638 return;
2639 }
2640 basecamp *temp_camp = *bcp;
2641 std::vector<tripoint> pts;
2642 for( const tripoint &elem : here.points_in_radius( here.getlocal( temp_camp->get_bb_pos() ),
2643 10 ) ) {
2644 if( g->critter_at( elem ) || !could_move_onto( elem ) || here.has_flag( TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, elem ) ||
2645 !here.has_floor( elem ) || g->is_dangerous_tile( elem ) ) {
2646 continue;
2647 }
2648 pts.push_back( elem );
2649 }
2650 if( !pts.empty() ) {
2651 wander_pos = here.getabs( random_entry( pts ) );
2652 return;
2653 }
2654 }
2655 move_pause();
2656}
2657
2658void npc::move_pause()
2659
2660{
2661 // make sure we're using the best weapon
2662 if( calendar::once_every( 1_hours ) ) {
2663 deactivate_bionic_by_id( bio_soporific );
2664 for( const bionic_id &bio_id : health_cbms ) {
2665 activate_bionic_by_id( bio_id );
2666 }
2667 if( wield_better_weapon() ) {
2668 return;
2669 }
2670 }
2671 // NPCs currently always aim when using a gun, even with no target
2672 // This simulates them aiming at stuff just at the edge of their range
2673 if( !weapon.is_gun() ) {
2674 character_funcs::do_pause( *this );
2675 return;
2676 }
2677
2678 // Stop, drop, and roll
2679 if( has_effect( effect_onfire ) ) {
2680 character_funcs::do_pause( *this );
2681 } else {
2682 aim();
2683 moves = std::min( moves, 0 );
2684 }
2685}
2686
